title: Andes Chunk Cookies
description: Mint chocolate chip cookies made with Andes mints.

instructions.step1: Combine flour and baking powders in a bowl
instructions.step2: Beat butter, sugars, vanilla and eggs until mixed
instructions.step3: Mix in Andes chunks, then flour mixture, form into a ball and chill for several hours
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking liner
instructions.step6: Bake for 10-12 minutes, cool on pan for 2 minutes and then move to cooling rack

title: Chocolate Crunchies
description: Deliciously crunchy chocolate treats for after dinner or with coffee.

item1.ingredient: crisp rice cereal, or corn flakes

instructions.step1: Melt dark chocolate in medium bowl, being careful to heat only enough to melt
instructions.step2: Add melting wafers and mix to melt, heating only if needed
instructions.step3: Combine dry ingredients, mix into chocolate until coated
instructions.step4: Pour onto parchment lined cookie sheet and spread evenly with spatula
instructions.step5: Place into fridge for about an hour until cooled
instructions.step6: Break into cookie sized pieces, keep refrigerated until served

notes: Cashews, pepitas and other nuts may be substituted or mixed with peanuts.

title: Death Bars
description: Peanut butter and chocolate chip bars.

instructions.step2: In a mixing bowl combine peanut butter, sugar, egg and vanilla until full incorporated
instructions.step4: Mix in toffee bits and chocolate chips
instructions.step5: Line 9x9 inch pan with foil, pour mixture into pan and smooth with spatula
instructions.step6: Bake for 20-22 minutes, cool and cut into bars

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl
instructions.step2: Mix egg, brown sugar, oil, molasses and vanilla until smooth
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients and mix well, chill for several hours
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking liner

instructions.step1: Combine dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl
instructions.step2: In a 2 cup measuring cup, lightly beat eggs, add oil and molasses, stir to combine
instructions.step3: Add liquid mixture to dry ingredients and mix well, chill for several hours
instructions.step5: Make 1 inch balls and drop onto greased cookie sheet or silicon baking liner
instructions.step6: Bake for 12-14 minutes, cool and coat with powdered sugar

title: Tahini Cookies

item5.ingredient: dried apricots, chopped, soaked and drained

instructions.step2: Combine tahini, honey, vanilla, cinnamon and dried fruit in a medium mixing bowl
instructions.step3: Mix in the nuts and seeds until well blended
instructions.step4: Make 1 inch balls, drop onto parchment lined cookie sheet and flatten lightly
instructions.step5: Bake for 10 minutes or until edges are slightly browned, cool for several minutes and then remove to wire rack

notes: Mix and match with cranberries, pepitas, or sunflower seeds.
